news_title: CFTC to Drop Crypto Rulebook by Q1 2026 — Potential Game-Changer for XRP
news_subtitle: CFTC Chairman Michael Selig targets a comprehensive crypto framework by end-Q1 2026, a development poised to boost XRP.

news_title: Sanctions push Russia toward a tighter, broader crypto rulebook
news_subtitle: Russia’s central bank plans to let non-qualified investors buy the most liquid cryptocurrencies after passing a knowledge test, with annual purchases capped at 300,000 rubles ($3,800).

news_title: Why Crypto’s Next Cycle Will Be Driven By Balance Sheets, Not Speculation
news_subtitle: Crypto is heading into 2026 after a leverage reset that pushed capital toward stablecoins, real-world assets and on-chain derivatives, reshaping the market into balance-sheet-driven financial infrastructure.

news_title: XRP Jumps Ahead of Bitcoin on Quantum Resistance With Major Testnet Upgrade
news_subtitle: XRP Ledger is already testing quantum-resistant transactions on its network, while Bitcoin developers warn a full upgrade could take years, which may set up a rare tech gap between the two chains.
